content.text: is designed to retrieve monthly exchange data from a billing system. It queries the

table and joins it with several other tables to gather detailed information about billing exchanges for a specified billing period. The procedure handles different types of exchanges, such as account turn-ons, turn-offs, meter exchanges, and others, by using a series of
queries. Each query targets specific exchange codes and retrieves relevant data, including facility details, utility company information, energy type, meter numbers, and account details.
The complexity of this stored procedure is medium due to the following factors:
It handles various exchange scenarios based on different exchange codes.
It includes data type conversions and conditional logic within the SQL queries.
: This parameter specifies the billing period for which the exchange data is to be retrieved. It is used in the
clause to filter records in the
The procedure begins by setting the
option to ON to prevent the message indicating the number of rows affected by a SQL statement from being returned.
It sets the transaction isolation level to
to allow dirty reads, which can improve performance by reducing locking overhead.
The procedure executes a series of
to gather data for different exchange scenarios:
: Retrieves data for a specific type of exchange, including meter and account details.
: Similar to '27', but with a focus on account turn-offs.
: Deals with exchange accounts, including historical account data.
: Manages meter exchanges, including previous meter details.
: Captures all other exchange types not explicitly handled by the previous queries.
Each query retrieves a consistent set of columns, ensuring that the
operation can be performed without errors.
can improve performance by reducing locking but leads to reading uncommitted or dirty data.
operations can be resource-intensive, especially if the tables involved are large. Indexing on join columns can help mitigate this.
operation requires all result sets to have the same structure, which can add overhead. If duplicate rows are not a concern, using
improve performance by avoiding the duplicate elimination step.
can lead to reading inconsistent data, which might not be suitable for all business scenarios.
: The complexity of the joins and the use of
can lead to slow performance if the underlying tables are large and not properly indexed.
: The procedure's complexity and the number of queries can make it challenging to maintain and debug.
: As the volume of data grows, the performance of this procedure may degrade, necessitating optimization or refactoring.
: The procedure lacks explicit error handling, which could lead to unhandled exceptions or failures in certain scenarios.

CREATE PROCEDURE [Billing].[usp_GetMonthlyExchangeData]
(
    @BillingPeriod AS BillingPeriod
)
AS 
BEGIN
	SET NOCOUNT ON;
	SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;

	SELECT ams.ShortDesc					'ExchangeType'
		,ed.BillingPeriod				'BillingPeriod'
		,f.OecFacilityNumber			'FacilityOECID'
		,f.FacilityName					'FacilityName'
		,f.Address1						'FacilityAddress'
		,uc.ShortDesc					'UtilityCompany'
		,edt.EnergyType					'EnergyType'
		,ed.CurrentAccountNumber		'CurrentAccountNumber'
		,ed.OriginalMeterNumber			'PreviousMeterNumber'
		,ed.CurrentMeterNumber			'MeterNumber'
		,NULL							'PreviousAssociatedDemandMeter'
		,ed.AssociatedDemandMeter		'AssociatedDemandMeter'
		,NULL							'PreviousMeterTurnOnDate'
		,NULL							'PreviousMeterTurnOffDate'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(ed.MeterEffectiveTurnOnDate)	'MeterTurnOnDate'
		,NULL							'PreviousMeterConstant'
		,ed.MeterConstant				'MeterConstant'
		,m.NgridCorrectorMeterId		'PressureCorrectorNumber'
		,NULL							'PreviousPressureCorrectorNumber'
		,a.OriginalAccountNumber		'PreviousAccountNumber'
		,NULL							'PreviousAccountTurnOnDate'
		,NULL							'PreviousAccountTurnOffDate'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(a.AccountEffectiveTurnOn) 'AccountTurnOnDate'
		,ad.AgencyShortDesc				'AgencyName'
		,ad.AgencyCodeOEC				'AgencyAbr'
		,ad.AgencyCodeOEC				'AgencyCode'
		,NULL							'PreviousTariffRateGroup'
		,a.DeliveryTariffRate			'TariffRateGroup'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(a.DeliveryTariffEffectiveDate) 'TariffRateChangeDate'
		,ed.IsProcessed
		,ed.Exclude
	FROM Common.ExchangeData AS ed
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS a ON a.AccountSeqid = ed.AccountSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.Meter AS m ON  m.MeterSeqid = ed.MeterSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.AgencyDivision AS ad ON ad.AgencyDivisionSeqid = a.AgencyAccount
		INNER JOIN Billing.Facility AS f ON f.FacilitySeqid = a.FacilityAccount
		INNER JOIN Billing.UtilityCompany AS uc ON uc.UtilityCompanySeqid = a.UtilityAccountProvider
		INNER JOIN Billing.EnergyDeliveryType AS edt ON edt.EnergyDeliveryType = a.EnergyAccountDescription
		INNER JOIN Billing.AccountMeterStatus AS ams ON ams.AccountMeterStatus = ed.ExchangeCode
	WHERE ed.ExchangeCode = '27'
		AND ed.IsProcessed <> 'N'
		AND ed.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod
	UNION
	------ 28 Account Turn off
	SELECT ams.ShortDesc					'ExchangeType'
		,ed.BillingPeriod				'BillingPeriod'
		,f.OecFacilityNumber			'FacilityOECID'
		,f.FacilityName					'FacilityName'
		,f.Address1						'FacilityAddress'
		,uc.ShortDesc					'UtilityCompany'
		,edt.EnergyType					'EnergyType'
		,ed.CurrentAccountNumber		'CurrentAccountNumber'
		,ed.OriginalMeterNumber			'PreviousMeterNumber'
		,ed.CurrentMeterNumber			'MeterNumber'
		,NULL							'PreviousAssociatedDemandMeter'
		,ed.AssociatedDemandMeter		'AssociatedDemandMeter'
		,NULL							'PreviousMeterTurnOnDate'
		,NULL							'PreviousMeterTurnOffDate'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(ed.MeterEffectiveTurnOnDate)	'MeterTurnOnDate'
		,NULL							'PreviousMeterConstant'
		,ed.MeterConstant				'MeterConstant'
		,NULL							'PressureCorrectorNumber'
		,NULL							'PreviousPressureCorrectorNumber'
		,a.OriginalAccountNumber		'PreviousAccountNumber'
		,NULL							'PreviousAccountTurnOnDate'
		,NULL							'PreviousAccountTurnOffDate'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(a.AccountEffectiveTurnOn) 'AccountTurnOnDate'
		,ad.AgencyShortDesc				'AgencyName'
		,ad.AgencyCodeOEC				'AgencyAbr'
		,ad.AgencyCodeOEC				'AgencyCode'
		,NULL							'PreviousTariffRateGroup'
		,a.DeliveryTariffRate			'TariffRateGroup'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(a.DeliveryTariffEffectiveDate) 'TariffRateChangeDate'
		,ed.IsProcessed
		,ed.Exclude	
	FROM Common.ExchangeData AS ed
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS a ON a.AccountSeqid = ed.AccountSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.AgencyDivision AS ad ON ad.AgencyDivisionSeqid = a.AgencyAccount
		INNER JOIN Billing.Facility AS f ON f.FacilitySeqid = a.FacilityAccount
		INNER JOIN Billing.UtilityCompany AS uc ON uc.UtilityCompanySeqid = a.UtilityAccountProvider
		INNER JOIN Billing.EnergyDeliveryType AS edt ON edt.EnergyDeliveryType = a.EnergyAccountDescription
		INNER JOIN Billing.AccountMeterStatus AS ams ON ams.AccountMeterStatus = ed.ExchangeCode
	WHERE ed.ExchangeCode = '28'
		AND ed.IsProcessed <> 'N'
		AND ed.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod
	UNION
	-- 47 Account Turn On
	SELECT ams.ShortDesc					'ExchangeType'
		,ed.BillingPeriod				'BillingPeriod'
		,f.OecFacilityNumber			'FacilityOECID'
		,f.FacilityName					'FacilityName'
		,f.Address1						'FacilityAddress'
		,uc.ShortDesc					'UtilityCompany'
		,edt.EnergyType					'EnergyType'
		,ed.CurrentAccountNumber		'CurrentAccountNumber'
		,ed.OriginalMeterNumber			'PreviousMeterNumber'
		,ed.CurrentMeterNumber			'MeterNumber'
		,NULL							'PreviousAssociatedDemandMeter'
		,ed.AssociatedDemandMeter		'AssociatedDemandMeter'
		,NULL							'PreviousMeterTurnOnDate'
		,NULL							'PreviousMeterTurnOffDate'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(ed.MeterEffectiveTurnOnDate)	'MeterTurnOnDate'
		,NULL							'PreviousMeterConstant'
		,ed.MeterConstant				'MeterConstant'
		,NULL							'PressureCorrectorNumber'
		,NULL							'PreviousPressureCorrectorNumber'
		,a.OriginalAccountNumber		'PreviousAccountNumber'
		,NULL							'PreviousAccountTurnOnDate'
		,NULL							'PreviousAccountTurnOffDate'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(a.AccountEffectiveTurnOn) 'AccountTurnOnDate'
		,ad.AgencyShortDesc				'AgencyName'
		,ad.AgencyCodeOEC				'AgencyAbr'
		,ad.AgencyCodeOEC				'AgencyCode'
		,NULL							'PreviousTariffRateGroup'
		,a.DeliveryTariffRate			'TariffRateGroup'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(a.DeliveryTariffEffectiveDate) 'TariffRateChangeDate'
		,ed.IsProcessed
		,ed.Exclude	
	FROM Common.ExchangeData AS ed
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS a ON a.AccountSeqid = ed.AccountSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.AgencyDivision AS ad ON ad.AgencyDivisionSeqid = a.AgencyAccount
		INNER JOIN Billing.Facility AS f ON f.FacilitySeqid = a.FacilityAccount
		INNER JOIN Billing.UtilityCompany AS uc ON uc.UtilityCompanySeqid = a.UtilityAccountProvider
		INNER JOIN Billing.EnergyDeliveryType AS edt ON edt.EnergyDeliveryType = a.EnergyAccountDescription
		INNER JOIN Billing.AccountMeterStatus AS ams ON ams.AccountMeterStatus = ed.ExchangeCode
	WHERE ed.ExchangeCode = '47'
		AND ed.IsProcessed <> 'N'
		AND ed.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod
	UNION
	------ 46 Meter Turn on
	SELECT ams.ShortDesc					'ExchangeType'
		,ed.BillingPeriod				'BillingPeriod'
		,f.OecFacilityNumber			'FacilityOECID'
		,f.FacilityName					'FacilityName'
		,f.Address1						'FacilityAddress'
		,uc.ShortDesc					'UtilityCompany'
		,edt.EnergyType					'EnergyType'
		,ed.CurrentAccountNumber		'CurrentAccountNumber'
		,ed.OriginalMeterNumber			'PreviousMeterNumber'
		,ed.CurrentMeterNumber			'MeterNumber'
		,NULL							'PreviousAssociatedDemandMeter'
		,ed.AssociatedDemandMeter		'AssociatedDemandMeter'
		,NULL							'PreviousMeterTurnOnDate'
		,NULL							'PreviousMeterTurnOffDate'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(ed.MeterEffectiveTurnOnDate)	'MeterTurnOnDate'
		,NULL							'PreviousMeterConstant'
		,ed.MeterConstant				'MeterConstant'
		,m.NgridCorrectorMeterId		'PressureCorrectorNumber'
		,NULL							'PreviousPressureCorrectorNumber'
		,a.OriginalAccountNumber		'PreviousAccountNumber'
		,NULL							'PreviousAccountTurnOnDate'
		,NULL							'PreviousAccountTurnOffDate'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(a.AccountEffectiveTurnOn) 'AccountTurnOnDate'
		,ad.AgencyShortDesc				'AgencyName'
		,ad.AgencyCodeOEC				'AgencyAbr'
		,ad.AgencyCodeOEC				'AgencyCode'
		,NULL							'PreviousTariffRateGroup'
		,a.DeliveryTariffRate			'TariffRateGroup'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(a.DeliveryTariffEffectiveDate) 'TariffRateChangeDate'
		,ed.IsProcessed
		,ed.Exclude	
	FROM Common.ExchangeData AS ed
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS a ON a.AccountSeqid = ed.AccountSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.Meter AS m ON m.MeterSeqid = ed.MeterSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.AgencyDivision AS ad ON ad.AgencyDivisionSeqid = a.AgencyAccount
		INNER JOIN Billing.Facility AS f ON f.FacilitySeqid = a.FacilityAccount
		INNER JOIN Billing.UtilityCompany AS uc ON uc.UtilityCompanySeqid = a.UtilityAccountProvider
		INNER JOIN Billing.EnergyDeliveryType AS edt ON edt.EnergyDeliveryType = a.EnergyAccountDescription
		INNER JOIN Billing.AccountMeterStatus AS ams ON ams.AccountMeterStatus = ed.ExchangeCode
	WHERE ed.ExchangeCode = '46' 
		AND ed.IsProcessed <> 'N'
		AND ed.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod
	UNION
	-- AX Exchange Account
	SELECT ams.ShortDesc					'ExchangeType'
		,ed.BillingPeriod				'BillingPeriod'
		,f.OecFacilityNumber			'FacilityOECID'
		,f.FacilityName					'FacilityName'
		,f.Address1						'FacilityAddress'
		,uc.ShortDesc					'UtilityCompany'
		,edt.EnergyType					'EnergyType'
		,ed.CurrentAccountNumber		'CurrentAccountNumber'
		,ed.OriginalMeterNumber			'PreviousMeterNumber'
		,ed.CurrentMeterNumber			'MeterNumber'
		,NULL							'PreviousAssociatedDemandMeter'
		,ed.AssociatedDemandMeter		'AssociatedDemandMeter'
		,NULL							'PreviousMeterTurnOnDate'
		,NULL							'PreviousMeterTurnOffDate'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(ed.MeterEffectiveTurnOnDate)	'MeterTurnOnDate'
		,NULL							'PreviousMeterConstant'
		,ed.MeterConstant				'MeterConstant'
		,NULL		'PressureCorrectorNumber'
		,NULL							'PreviousPressureCorrectorNumber'
		,a.OriginalAccountNumber		'PreviousAccountNumber'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(aOLD.AccountEffectiveTurnOn)		'PreviousAccountTurnOnDate'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(aold.AccountEffectiveTurnOff)	'PreviousAccountTurnOffDate'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(a.AccountEffectiveTurnOn) 'AccountTurnOnDate'
		,ad.AgencyShortDesc				'AgencyName'
		,ad.AgencyCodeOEC				'AgencyAbr'
		,ad.AgencyCodeOEC				'AgencyCode'
		,aOLD.DeliveryTariffRate							'PreviousTariffRateGroup'
		,a.DeliveryTariffRate			'TariffRateGroup'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(a.DeliveryTariffEffectiveDate) 'TariffRateChangeDate'
		,ed.IsProcessed
		,ed.Exclude	
	FROM Common.ExchangeData AS ed
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS a ON a.AccountSeqid = ed.AccountSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.AgencyDivision AS ad ON ad.AgencyDivisionSeqid = a.AgencyAccount
		INNER JOIN Billing.Facility AS f ON f.FacilitySeqid = a.FacilityAccount
		INNER JOIN Billing.UtilityCompany AS uc ON uc.UtilityCompanySeqid = a.UtilityAccountProvider
		INNER JOIN Billing.EnergyDeliveryType AS edt ON edt.EnergyDeliveryType = a.EnergyAccountDescription
		INNER JOIN Billing.AccountMeterStatus AS ams ON ams.AccountMeterStatus = ed.ExchangeCode
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS aOLD ON aOLD.UniqueAccountSeqid = a.UniqueAccountSeqid AND aOLD.RecordVersion = (a.RecordVersion-1)
	WHERE ed.ExchangeCode = 'AX'
		AND ed.IsProcessed <> 'N'
		AND ed.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod
	UNION
	-- 45 Exchange Meter
	SELECT ams.ShortDesc					'ExchangeType'
		,ed.BillingPeriod				'BillingPeriod'
		,f.OecFacilityNumber			'FacilityOECID'
		,f.FacilityName					'FacilityName'
		,f.Address1						'FacilityAddress'
		,uc.ShortDesc					'UtilityCompany'
		,edt.EnergyType					'EnergyType'
		,ed.CurrentAccountNumber		'CurrentAccountNumber'
		,ed.OriginalMeterNumber			'PreviousMeterNumber'
		,ed.CurrentMeterNumber			'MeterNumber'
		,mOLD.AssociatedDemandMeter		'PreviousAssociatedDemandMeter'
		,ed.AssociatedDemandMeter		'AssociatedDemandMeter'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(mOLD.MeterEffectiveOnDate) 'PreviousMeterTurnOnDate'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(mOLD.MeterEffectiveOffDate) 'PreviousMeterTurnOffDate'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(ed.MeterEffectiveTurnOnDate)	'MeterTurnOnDate'
		,mOLD.MeterConstant				'PreviousMeterConstant'
		,ed.MeterConstant				'MeterConstant'
		,m.NgridCorrectorMeterId		'PressureCorrectorNumber'
		,mOLD.NgridCorrectorMeterId		'PreviousPressureCorrectorNumber'
		,a.OriginalAccountNumber		'PreviousAccountNumber'
		,NULL							'PreviousAccountTurnOnDate'
		,NULL							'PreviousAccountTurnOffDate'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(a.AccountEffectiveTurnOn) 'AccountTurnOnDate'
		,ad.AgencyShortDesc				'AgencyName'
		,ad.AgencyCodeOEC				'AgencyAbr'
		,ad.AgencyCodeOEC				'AgencyCode'
		,NULL 							'PreviousTariffRateGroup'
		,a.DeliveryTariffRate			'TariffRateGroup'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(a.DeliveryTariffEffectiveDate) 'TariffRateChangeDate'
		,ed.IsProcessed
		,ed.Exclude	
	FROM Common.ExchangeData AS ed
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS a ON a.AccountSeqid = ed.AccountSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.Meter AS m ON m.MeterSeqid = ed.MeterSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.AgencyDivision AS ad ON ad.AgencyDivisionSeqid = a.AgencyAccount
		INNER JOIN Billing.Facility AS f ON f.FacilitySeqid = a.FacilityAccount
		INNER JOIN Billing.UtilityCompany AS uc ON uc.UtilityCompanySeqid = a.UtilityAccountProvider
		INNER JOIN Billing.EnergyDeliveryType AS edt ON edt.EnergyDeliveryType = a.EnergyAccountDescription
		INNER JOIN Billing.AccountMeterStatus AS ams ON ams.AccountMeterStatus = ed.ExchangeCode
		INNER JOIN Billing.Meter AS mOLD ON mOLD.UniqueMeterSeqid = m.UniqueMeterSeqid AND mOLD.RecordVersion = (m.RecordVersion-1)
	WHERE ed.ExchangeCode = '45'
		AND ed.IsProcessed <> 'N'
		AND ed.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod
	UNION
	-- All others
	SELECT ams.ShortDesc					'ExchangeType'
		,ed.BillingPeriod				'BillingPeriod'
		,f.OecFacilityNumber			'FacilityOECID'
		,f.FacilityName					'FacilityName'
		,f.Address1						'FacilityAddress'
		,uc.ShortDesc					'UtilityCompany'
		,edt.EnergyType					'EnergyType'
		,ed.CurrentAccountNumber		'CurrentAccountNumber'
		,ed.OriginalMeterNumber			'PreviousMeterNumber'
		,ed.CurrentMeterNumber			'MeterNumber'
		,NULL							'PreviousAssociatedDemandMeter'
		,ed.AssociatedDemandMeter		'AssociatedDemandMeter'
		,NULL							'PreviousMeterTurnOnDate'
		,NULL							'PreviousMeterTurnOffDate'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(ed.MeterEffectiveTurnOnDate)	'MeterTurnOnDate'
		,NULL							'PreviousMeterConstant'
		,ed.MeterConstant				'MeterConstant'
		,NULL							'PressureCorrectorNumber'
		,NULL							'PreviousPressureCorrectorNumber'
		,a.OriginalAccountNumber		'PreviousAccountNumber'
		,NULL							'PreviousAccountTurnOnDate'
		,NULL							'PreviousAccountTurnOffDate'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(a.AccountEffectiveTurnOn) 'AccountTurnOnDate'
		,ad.AgencyShortDesc				'AgencyName'
		,ad.AgencyCodeOEC				'AgencyAbr'
		,ad.AgencyCodeOEC				'AgencyCode'
		,NULL							'PreviousTariffRateGroup'
		,a.DeliveryTariffRate			'TariffRateGroup'
		,dbo.ConvertYYYYMMDDToDatetime(a.DeliveryTariffEffectiveDate) 'TariffRateChangeDate'
		,ed.IsProcessed
		,ed.Exclude	
	FROM Common.ExchangeData AS ed
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS a ON a.AccountSeqid = ed.AccountSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.AgencyDivision AS ad ON ad.AgencyDivisionSeqid = a.AgencyAccount
		INNER JOIN Billing.Facility AS f ON f.FacilitySeqid = a.FacilityAccount
		INNER JOIN Billing.UtilityCompany AS uc ON uc.UtilityCompanySeqid = a.UtilityAccountProvider
		INNER JOIN Billing.EnergyDeliveryType AS edt ON edt.EnergyDeliveryType = a.EnergyAccountDescription
		INNER JOIN Billing.AccountMeterStatus AS ams ON ams.AccountMeterStatus = ed.ExchangeCode
	WHERE ed.ExchangeCode NOT IN ('27','28','45','46','47','AX') 
		AND ed.IsProcessed <> 'N'
		AND ed.BillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod;
END;
